summary: Police Chief Jesse Stone's suspended in Paradise. He helps a friend as "temp" with a serial killer in Boston. He gets his first cellphone to avoid calls from his ex. Paradise PD's way over its head with a convenience store robbery/murder.
cast: Tom Selleck|Kathy Baker|Kohl Sudduth|Stephen McHattie|Krista Allen|William Sadler|Mae Whitman|Todd Hofley|Saul Rubinek|William Devane|Kerri Smith|Jeremy Akerman|Guy Germain|Rothaford Gray|Tom Gallant|Gay Hauser|Brian Heighton|Megan Edwards|Stephen Coats|Michael Pellerin|Christopher Killam|Suzanne Hawkins|Jeremiah Sparks|Scott Owen|John Shurko|Andy Smith|Gil Anderson|Joe the Dog|Shawn Doucette|Brendan Mackereth|Scott Nickerson|Gregory Richardson
keywords: golden labrador|murder|police chief|stocking mask|hit and run
title: Jesse Stone: Crímenes en Boston
